titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 3-(3-5, dicholorophenyl)-N-(1-methylethyl)-2,4-dioxo-1-imidazolidine carboxamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/20/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified chemical.
